column2: BRIEF-Whitestone REIT Files For Mixed Shelf Of Up To $750 Mln May 17 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * WHITESTONE REIT FILES FOR MIXED SHELF OF UP TO $750 MILLION – SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2IpuVFc) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Whitestone REIT Says Based On Preliminary Vote Count, All 3 Of Co's Trustee Nominees Have Been Re-Elected May 17 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * WHITESTONE REIT - BASED ON PRELIMINARY VOTE COUNT, SHAREHOLDERS DID NOT APPROVE, ON A NON-BINDING ADVISORY BASIS, COMPANY’S EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION * WHITESTONE REIT - BASED ON PRELIMINARY VOTE COUNT, ALL THREE OF WHITESTONE’S TRUSTEE NOMINEES HAVE BEEN RE-ELECTED TO WHITESTONE BOARD OF TRUSTEES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Whitestone REIT Says Egan-Jones Proxy Services Recommends That Co's Shareholders Vote "For All" Of Whitestone's Trustees May 9 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * WHITESTONE REIT SAYS EGAN-JONES PROXY SERVICES RECOMMENDS THAT CO’S SHAREHOLDERS VOTE “FOR ALL” OF WHITESTONE’S TRUSTEES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Whitestone REIT Reports Q1 FFO Per Share $0.24 May 7 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * 3.9% SAME STORE NOI GROWTH IN WHOLLY OWNED PORTFOLIO IN QUARTER * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $136.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Whitestone REIT Says Glass Lewis Recommended Co's Shareholders Vote On Co's White Proxy Card May 7 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * WHITESTONE REIT - GLASS LEWIS RECOMMENDED CO’S SHAREHOLDERS VOTE ON CO’S WHITE PROXY CARD, “FOR” WHITESTONE TRUSTEES NANDITA BERRY & JIM MASTANDREA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Whitestone Comments On ISS Recommendation May 4 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * WHITESTONE REIT - ISSUED STATEMENT IN RESPONSE TO A REPORT ISSUED BY INSTITUTIONAL SHAREHOLDER SERVICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-KBS Strategic Opportunity REIT - Released An Open Letter To Whitestone REIT Shareholders Calling On Them To Vote For Its Nominees April 23 (Reuters) - Whitestone REIT: * KBS STRATEGIC OPPORTUNITY REIT - RELEASED AN OPEN LETTER TO WHITESTONE REIT SHAREHOLDERS CALLING ON THEM TO VOTE FOR ITS NOMINEES * KBS - OWN APPROXIMATELY 9.61% OF OUTSTANDING SHARES OF WHITESTONE REIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
